titles.title: FACE Act
FACE Act
Federal Advance Contracts Enhancement Act
Federal Advance Contracts Enhancement Act
FACE Act
FACE Act
Federal Advance Contracts Enhancement Act
Federal Advance Contracts Enhancement Act

A bill to amend the Post-Katrina Emergency Management Reform Act of 2006 to incorporate the recommendations made by the Government Accountability Office relating to advance contracts, and for other purposes.
Federal Advance Contracts Enhancement Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Johnson with amendments. With written report No. 116-84.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 188.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
